EmailTemplate.name: ED-2018-10-MS Azure IaaS Solutions eBook.20180928 Email Send - Email 2 - Subject
EmailTemplate.subject: How to Deploy & Manage Azure IaaS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001bXSZAA2]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Are you struggling to deploy and manage Azure IaaS? You're not alone. That's why we co-published this guide, Microsoft Azure IaaS Solutions, Deploying and Managing the Azure Platform <[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001bXSZAA2]]>, with O'Reilly to help you.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/microsoft-azure-iaas-solutions/?utm_campaign=70157000001bXSZAA2]]>
By the end of this eBook, you will:
- Know how to manage your Azure IaaS solution, including VMs and storage, using both the Azure Cl and Azure Portal Interface - Understand the implication and requirements for security, identity, and access management
- Increase the availability and recoverability of Azure storage workloads
Regards, Megan
